content.text: This is the second, rather noisy, video from my shoot for Elements with Dr Andrea Sella (it’s the equipment making that noise, by the way). This time we’re messing about with mercury. The jar really is astonishingly heavy.

This is the second, rather noisy, video from my shoot for Elements with Dr Andrea Sella (it’s the equipment making that noise, by the way). This time we’re messing about with mercury. The jar really is astonishingly heavy.
